entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improove the overall stability of Hot Reloading by allowing us to declare sync points for the hot reload agent. #22520
  • .NET 6 breaks EF Core 2.2 #22519
  • Publishing trimmed console app prints a message which warns about trimming #22518
  • dotnet restore: support RestoreConfigFile from csproj or Directory.Build.props #22517
  • dotnet 3.1.414 installs on OSX, 3.1.415 does not install correctly #22516
  • Using Remove in Directory.Build.props is ignored #22515
  • EventWaitHandle.OpenExisting(String, EventWaitHandleRights) is no longer existed, but you documented? #22514

Closed

  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main validation-sdk-.NET Core SDK 3.1.4xx, sdk, .NET Core SDK 3.1.4xx #sdk-117294-.NETCoreSDK3.1.4xx #22492
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main validation-sdk-.NET Core SDK 3.1.1xx, sdk, .NET Core SDK 3.1.1xx #sdk-117297-.NETCoreSDK3.1.1xx #22493
  • Shared OutputPath for whole solution is causing build failure #22438
    Discussion
  • Binaries for v3.1.415 unavailable #22504
  • The remote certificate is invalid according to the validation procedure: RemoteCertificateNameMismatch, RemoteCertificateChainErrors #21573
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1.4xx #22524
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0.4xx #22523
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0.2xx #22522
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Ensure references added using "Reference" are correctly copied in BlazorWASM projects #22470
    Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • Blazor AOT Publish Tests #22477
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-AspNetCore
  • Update build.yml #22361
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #22510
    Area-Infrastructure
